title: Music and Memory Program Eases Ails Associated with Dementia
author: John Garcia
description: On "Health and Medicine," John Garcia explores the The M.U.S.I.C Project's partnership with the Department of Aging and Disability Services for its Music and Memory program for people suffering from dementia.
cleaned_text: Music is the soundtrack of our lives. A time capsule bringing back special moments sometimes forgotten. Especially for 72-year-old Carlos Cruz who's reliving memories, thanks to a tiny gadget. On "Health and Medicine," John Garcia explores the The [M.U.S.I.C Project](http://www.musicprojecttx.org/)'s partnership with the [Department of Aging and Disability Services](http://www.dads.state.tx.us/) for its Music and Memory program for people suffering from dementia.
